item.title: Talks and Workshops
item.description: 2024 Link to heading The Final Chapter: Unlimited ways to bypass your macOS privacy mechanisms /CA: Wojciech Regula/ (BlackHat Asia) Presentation 2023 Link to heading Launch and Environment Constraints Deep Dive (MacSysAdmin, Objective By The Sea) Presentation 2022 Link to heading 20+ New Ways to Bypass Your macOS Privacy Mechanisms /CA: Wojciech Regula/ (BlackHat EU) Presentation Video macOS Vulnerabilities Hiding in Plain Sight (BlackHat Asia, Troopers, Zer0Con) Presentation Whitepaper
